class RemoteWidgetFactoryStub

Detailed Description

An interface for an adapter between a remote collection widget (ListWidget, GridWidget, etc) and the underlying data for that widget.

The implementor is responsible for making a RemoteWidget for each item in the data set.

Member Function Documentation

virtual int32_t gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::getCount ( ) [pure virtual]

How many items are in the data set represented by this Adapter.

Returns:
Count of items.
virtual int64_t gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::getItemId ( int32_t  position) [pure virtual]

Get the row id associated with the specified position in the list.

Parameters:
positionThe position of the item within the data set whose row id we want.
Returns:
The id of the item at the specified position.
virtual ui::RemoteWidget* gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::getLoadingWidget ( ) [pure virtual]

This allows for the use of a custom loading Widget which appears between the time that getWidgetAt(int32_t) is called and returns.

If null is returned, a default loading Widget will be used.

Returns:
The RemoteWidget representing the desired loading widget.
virtual ui::RemoteWidget* gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::getWidgetAt ( int32_t  position) [pure virtual]

Get the data item associated with the specified position in the data set.

Parameters:
positionThe position of the item within the Factory's data set of the item whose widget we want.
Returns:
A RemoteWidget object corresponding to the data at the specified position.
virtual int32_t gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::getWidgetTypeCount ( ) [pure virtual]

Get the number of types of Widget that will be eturned by this factory.

Returns:
The number of types of widget that will be returned by this factory.
virtual bool gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::hasStableIds ( ) [pure virtual]

Indicates whether the item ids are stable across changes to the underlying data.

Returns:
True if the same id always refers to the same object.
virtual void gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::onCreate ( ) [pure virtual]

Called when your factory is first constructed.

The same factory may be shared across multiple RemoteWidgetAdapters depending on the intent passed.

virtual void gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::onDataSetChanged ( ) [pure virtual]

Called when notifyDataSetChanged() is triggered on the remote adapter.

This allows a RemoteWidgetFactory to respond to data changes by updating any internal references.

Note: expensive tasks can be safely performed synchronously within this method. In the interim, the old data will be displayed within the widget.

See also:
AppWidgetManager::notifyAppWidgetDataChanged
virtual void gaia::ui::RemoteWidgetFactory::onDestroy ( ) [pure virtual]

Called when the last RemoteWidgetAdapter that is associated with this factory is unbound.
